The Rate Posterior¶

class rates_tool.rate.RatePosterior(bgs, fg, coinc)[source]¶

Bases: object

Posterior object for counting with confusion between foreground and background.

coinc[source]¶
dtype[source]¶

We use the log of the foreground and background rates, under the names log_Rf and log_Rb for parameters.

log_fg[source]¶

The log of the foreground to background likelihood ratio.

log_likelihood(p)[source]¶
log_pbacks(p)[source]¶

Returns the log of the probability that each coinc is a background event.

log_pfores(p)[source]¶

Returns the log of the probability that each coinc is a foreground event.

log_prior(p)[source]¶

The prior for each rate has a density in rate space of

\[p(R) \propto \frac{1}{\sqrt{R}}\]
to_params(x)[source]¶
